content:
What a great idea! A fantasy football draft party with friends sounds like a blast!

To help you find a suitable brunch spot, I'll need to know your location. Could you please share your city or zip code with me? That way, I can provide you with a list of popular brunch spots in your area that can accommodate a large group.

Additionally, it would be helpful to know how many people will be attending your draft party, as this will give me a better idea of the type of venue that can accommodate your group size.

Once I have this information, I can suggest some great options for you to consider. I'll also provide you with some tips on how to plan a successful fantasy football draft party, including recommendations for food, drinks, and activities to keep your friends entertained!
